entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Fort Qu'Appelle
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:49 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Indian Head AAFC 08:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Temperature: -5.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -6.6°C
Wind: NW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Freezing rain. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain beginning early this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 08:55 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Freezing rain or snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to snow and ending near midnight then cloudy. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 08:55 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 08:55 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 08:55 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
